Introduction

Zhang Yixing, known professionally as Lay Zhang or simply Lay, is a Chinese singer, songwriter, record producer, dancer, and actor. He is best known as a member of the boy group EXO and its Chinese sub-unit EXO-M.

On April 8, 2022, Lay announced on his SNS accounts that he left SM Entertainment but will continue to be a member of EXO.

Fun facts

1
As an ambassador of high-end fashion brand Valentino, Lay has attended multiple fashion shows and events in Asia and Europe, as well as at the annual Met Gala.
…
2
Lay was officially introduced as an EXO member on January 17th, 2012.
…
3
In 2019, Lay was announced as Calvin Klein's first Chinese global spokesperson for Calvin Klein's underwear and jeans lines.
…
4
Lay is good friends with VIXX's Leo.
…
5
On September 9, 2016, Lay attended the 2016 BAZAAR Stars' Charity Night which resulted in him donating 10 ambulances with worth amounting to 700 thousand yuan.
…
6
Lay had a cameo in the web series "EXO Next Door" in 2015 as himself and made a special appearance on the Chinese web series "The Tomb of Sea" in 2018.
…
7
Lay speaks Chinese, Korean, and English.
…
8
In 2015, Lay won 3rd place in TV Star Academy (Hunan Economics TV show).
…
9
In SHINee’s 2010 concert tour, Lay briefly filled in as Jonghyun’s dance replacement.
…
10
Lay can play the Piano.
…
